FLQ

Application layer solution for interaction between node and database

Get started quickly ▶

Step configuration

Configure each part of the SQL separately, or configure a part of the SQL multiple times. You can configure public options first and save them for later use.

Parallel query

When Flq internally queries virtual fields and sub fields, it will query in parallel, greatly improving the query efficiency

Asynchronous subscription

Flq uses its own asyncevent to asynchronously subscribe to events. All synchronous listeners will be executed in sequence and all asynchronous listeners will be executed in parallel.

# English documents will not be provided temporarily
